title: (Tues Full) Lunchbox is Mad for Reason Wife Gave to Cancel Date Night + Loser of Draft Plays Yogurt or Sour Cream? + Has the Haunted Doll Cast a Curse?
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Lunchbox is Mad for Reason Wife Gave to Cancel Date Night + Loser of Draft Plays Yogurt or Sour Cream? + Has the Haunted Doll Cast a Curse?
description:
Lunchbox shares the reason his wife cancelled their date night to a comedy show. He wants to know if we’re Team LB or Team Wife. We reveal the loser of the Famous Bald Celeb draft and the loser has to play is it yogurt or sour cream…with the result of eating the one they choose. We listen to Lunchbox challenging the haunted doll to put a curse on him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
